instruction.value: Administer undiluted solution over 2 to 5 minutes up to a maximum rate of 2 mg/minute.
Administer by continuous infusion titrating to response.
Administer dose by direct intravenous route over 2 minutes.
Administer by direct intravenous route up to 10 mg/minute. Additional doses may be given at 10 minute intervals, up to a total dose of 300 mg.
Administer by continuous infusion, titrate to response, up to a MAXIMUM cumulative dose of 300 mg.
